title: Powell on attack on American system - similarity

content.prompt: Based on the excerpt, Powell would have been most likely to support which of the following during the 1980s?

choices.label: An increase in union membership for jobs in the service sector
The curtailment of civil liberties in order to combat terrorist threats
Significant tax cuts and the deregulation of many industries
The relaxation of immigration policies and the granting of amnesty
